nodes.documentation:
Set the current AssetContract address and initialize the instance of AssetContract.
Requirement: Only the contract owner can call.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "No active offering for that Asset"

arguments.value: No active offering for that Asset

nodes.documentation: Get the details about a offer for _tokenId. Throws an error if there is no activeOffering offer for _tokenId.

nodes.documentation:
Get all tokenId's that are currently available for lend. 
Returns an empty array if none exist.

nodes.documentation:
Removes an existing offer by returning the asset to the Owner
Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Asset Removed From Lending"
Requirement: Only the lender of _tokenId can remove an offer.
nodes.name: removeOffer

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct P2PMarketplace.borrowedAsset storage ref[] storage ref
struct P2PMarketplace.borrowedAsset storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
Executes the lending of _tokenId.
Sends the price to the contract.
Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Lent".
FEE MUST BE BUILT INTO THE FRONT END CODE
Requirement: The msg.value must be greater then dollarsPerPeriod of _tokenId to account for price and fees
Requirement: There must be an activeOffering offer for _tokenId
nodes.name: lendAsset

nodes.documentation:
Returns an token to owner
No funds sent as payment was already sent
Require original lender to call this function as they own token
nodes.name: returnAsset

methods.constructor: Set the current AssetContract address and initialize the instance of AssetContract. Requirement: Only the contract owner can call.

getAllTokenOnOffer().notice: Get all tokenId's that are currently available for lend.  Returns an empty array if none exist.

getOffer(uint256).notice: Get the details about a offer for _tokenId. Throws an error if there is no activeOffering offer for _tokenId.

lendAsset(uint256).notice: Executes the lending of _tokenId. Sends the price to the contract. Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Lent". FEE MUST BE BUILT INTO THE FRONT END CODE Requirement: The msg.value must be greater then dollarsPerPeriod of _tokenId to account for price and fees Requirement: There must be an activeOffering offer for _tokenId

removeOffer(uint256).notice: Removes an existing offer by returning the asset to the Owner Emits the MarketTransaction event with txType "Asset Removed From Lending" Requirement: Only the lender of _tokenId can remove an offer.

returnAsset(uint256).notice: Returns an token to owner No funds sent as payment was already sent Require original lender to call this function as they own token
